entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who has magical abilities. He uses his wand to move objects around.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character who witnesses Dumbledore's actions and is affected by them.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as a part of Harry's family, but seems to be in a state of shock.

relationships.description: Dumbledore owns the wand that he uses for his magic.
Harry's hand has been affected by Dumbledore's magic, as it is described as being 'blackened and shrivelled'.
Dumbledore is talking to Uncle Vernon.
Harry has a family relationship with the Dursleys, as they are his relatives.
